resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DEVICE_LIST (DEVICENAME TEXT PRIMARY KEY, TIME TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

(LOGNUMBER INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DEVICENAME TEXT, BOARD_VER INTEGER, SNAME_1 TEXT, DATA_1 REAL, SNAME_2 TEXT, DATA_2 REAL, SNAME_3 TEXT, DATA_3 REAL, SNAME_4 TEXT, DATA_4 REAL, TIME TIMESTAMP DEFAULT (datetime("'now','localtime'")) );

(LOGNUMBER INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DEVICENAME TEXT, BOARD_VER INTEGER, SNAME_1 TEXT, DATA_1 REAL, SNAME_2 TEXT, DATA_2 REAL, SNAME_3 TEXT, DATA_3 REAL, SNAME_4 TEXT, DATA_4 REAL, TIME TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
